import React, {Component} from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import logo from '../../asserts/img/library-logo.png'; import logoSmall from '../../asserts/img/library-logo-sm.png'; import {SearchBar} from '../../components/searchBarComponent/searchBar' import App from '../../App' const jumbotronStyles = { height: '75px', margin: 'auto', backgroundColor: '#fff', borderBottom: '3px solid #1429D7', padding: 'auto' } export class Header extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } render() { let signIn = this.props.signIn return (
{!signIn? :
